title: JWT auth
name: PostAuthJwt
description: Authenticate to APi using JWT

title: Delete single
name: DeleteBeer
description: Delete a Beer by its ID in database.

title: Get single
name: GetBeer
description: Get a Beer by its ID in database.

title: Get list
name: GetBeers
description: Get a list of beers, use filtering and ordering to query precisely.

title: Get count
name: GetBeersCount
description: Get the total number of beers in database.

title: Search list
name: GetSearchBeers
description: Search for a beer, you can use ordering and pagination here.

title: Add single
name: PostBeer
description:
Add a new Beer to the database

returns the added object if it succeded.

title: Update single
name: PutBeer
description:
Update a Beer fields by its ID,

returns the modified Beer in case of success.

title: Delete single
name: DeleteBreweryId
description: Delete a Brewery from database (this does not delete location or beers related to this brewery and does not updates fields, use it with caution).

title: Get count
name: GetBreweriesCount
description: Get the total number of Breweries in database.

title: Get list
name: GetBrewery
description: Get a list of breweries, you can use ordering and pagination here.

title: Get single
name: GetBreweryId
description: Get a single Brewery from database

title: Search list
name: GetSearchBreweries
description: Search for breweries by their names.

title: Delete single
name: DeleteBreweriesLocation
description: Delete a Brewery Location from database (this does not delete associated brewery and does not update brewery_location_id field , use it with caution).

title: Get list
name: GetBreweriesLocations
description: Get a list of Breweries, you can use ordering and pagination here.

title: Get count
name: GetBreweriesLocationsCount
description: Get the total number of breweries-locations in database

title: Get single
name: GetBreweriesLocationsId

Parameter.description: Set to true if you want to find close bars

description: Get a single Brewery Location record.

title: Get near breweries
name: GetBreweriesLocationsNear

Parameter.description: Should include bars around breweries or not

description: Get the nearest breweries-locations withing a radius of distance (in km) at given GPS coordinates (includes brewery name).

title: Add single
name: PostBreweriesLocation
description: Add a new Brewery Location to database.

title: Update single
name: PutBreweriesLocation
description: Update a Brewery Location in database.

title: Add single
name: PostBrewery
description: Add a new Brewery to database.

title: Update single
name: PutBrewery
description: Update a single Brewery in database.

title: Get single - by id
name: GetUserById
description: Get user informations by its id.

title: Get single - by username
name: GetUserByUsername
description: Get user informations by its username.

title: Get list
name: GetUsers
description: Get a list of users, you can use pagination and ordering here.

title: Get count
name: GetUsersCount
description: Get total count of users

title: Create single
name: PostUser
description: Create your user account

title: Update single
name: PutUser

Parameter.description: User id (replace by "me" to edit your profile)

description: Update User informations by its ID, if it's your ID, you don't need admin permissions.
